title: Recognition of a state's economic zone

content.question: United Nations recognition of a state's "exclusive economic zone" allows the state to

choices.label: establish economic free trade zones within the sovereign territory of other states
claim national economic jurisdiction over 200 nautical miles of water extending from its coast
limit importation of competitive goods and services from other countries
protect domestic production by imposing tariffs on all foreign-made products
form limited economic alliances with other countries

content.answer: claim national economic jurisdiction over 200 nautical miles of water extending from its coast

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe a relevant geographic concept, process, model, or theory in a specified context.
